name: xz

variants.name: libs
variants.description: Build shared libs, static libs or both

description:
XZ Utils is free general-purpose data compression software with high
compression ratio. XZ Utils were written for POSIX-like systems, but
also work on some not-so-POSIX systems. XZ Utils are the successor to
LZMA Utils.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependent_to.name: python
dependent_to.description: The Python programming language.

dependent_to.name: root
dependent_to.description: ROOT is a data analysis framework.

dependent_to.name: spack
dependent_to.description:
Spack is a multi-platform package manager that builds and installs
multiple versions and configurations of software. It works on Linux,
macOS, and many supercomputers. Spack is non-destructive: installing a
new version of a package does not break existing installations, so many
configurations of the same package can coexist.

dependent_to.name: r
dependent_to.description:
R is 'GNU S', a freely available language and environment for
statistical computing and graphics which provides a wide variety of
statistical and graphical techniques: linear and nonlinear modelling,
statistical tests, time series analysis, classification, clustering,
etc. Please consult the R project homepage for further information.

dependent_to.name: rpm
dependent_to.description:
The RPM package manager https://github.com/rpm-software-
management/rpm/blob/master/INSTALL Note that debugedit is an additional
tool that *should* compile with adding libdw and elfutils, but the
library (as of 4.16.1.2) is being removed from rpm and will be put
somewhere else.

dependent_to.name: zstd
dependent_to.description:
Zstandard, or zstd as short version, is a fast lossless compression
algorithm, targeting real-time compression scenarios at zlib-level and
better compression ratios.

dependent_to.name: gdal
dependent_to.description:
GDAL (Geospatial Data Abstraction Library) is a translator library for
raster and vector geospatial data formats that is released under an
X/MIT style Open Source license by the Open Source Geospatial
Foundation. As a library, it presents a single raster abstract data
model and vector abstract data model to the calling application for all
supported formats. It also comes with a variety of useful command line
utilities for data translation and processing.

dependent_to.name: htslib
dependent_to.description: C library for high-throughput sequencing data formats.

dependent_to.name: libarchive
dependent_to.description:
libarchive: C library and command-line tools for reading and writing
tar, cpio, zip, ISO, and other archive formats.

dependent_to.name: hpctoolkit
dependent_to.description:
HPCToolkit is an integrated suite of tools for measurement and analysis
of program performance on computers ranging from multicore desktop
systems to the nation's largest supercomputers. By using statistical
sampling of timers and hardware performance counters, HPCToolkit
collects accurate measurements of a program's work, resource
consumption, and inefficiency and attributes them to the full calling
context in which they occur.

dependent_to.name: libunwind
dependent_to.description:
A portable and efficient C programming interface (API) to determine the
call-chain of a program.

dependent_to.name: cnvnator
dependent_to.description:
A tool for CNV discovery and genotyping from depth-of-coverage by mapped
reads.

dependent_to.name: tar
dependent_to.description:
GNU Tar provides the ability to create tar archives, as well as various
other kinds of manipulation.

dependent_to.name: squashfs
dependent_to.description: Squashfs - read only compressed filesystem

dependent_to.name: pixz
dependent_to.description: Pixz (pronounced pixie) is a parallel, indexing version of xz.

dependent_to.name: libtiff
dependent_to.description: LibTIFF - Tag Image File Format (TIFF) Library and Utilities.

dependent_to.name: gettext
dependent_to.description: GNU internationalization (i18n) and localization (l10n) library.

dependent_to.name: paraview
dependent_to.description:
ParaView is an open-source, multi-platform data analysis and
visualization application. This package includes the Catalyst in-situ
library for versions 5.7 and greater, otherwise use the catalyst
package.

dependent_to.name: the-silver-searcher
dependent_to.description: Fast recursive grep alternative

dependent_to.name: r-rjava
dependent_to.description:
Low-Level R to Java Interface. Low-level interface to Java VM very much
like .C/.Call and friends. Allows creation of objects, calling methods
and accessing fields.

dependent_to.name: libtool
dependent_to.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependent_to.name: bedtools2
dependent_to.description:
Collectively, the bedtools utilities are a swiss-army knife of tools for
a wide-range of genomics analysis tasks. The most widely-used tools
enable genome arithmetic: that is, set theory on the genome.

dependent_to.name: pxz
dependent_to.description: Pxz is a parallel LZMA compressor using liblzma.

dependent_to.name: man-db
dependent_to.description:
man-db is an implementation of the standard Unix documentation system
accessed using the man command. It uses a Berkeley DB database in place
of the traditional flat-text whatis databases.

dependent_to.name: file
dependent_to.description:
The file command is "a file type guesser", that is, a command-line tool
that tells you in words what kind of data a file contains

dependent_to.name: shapeit4
dependent_to.description:
SHAPEIT4 is a fast and accurate method for estimation of haplotypes (aka
phasing) for SNP array and high coverage sequencing data.

dependent_to.name: libssh2
dependent_to.description: libssh2 is a client-side C library implementing the SSH2 protocol

dependent_to.name: libxml2
dependent_to.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.

dependent_to.name: tkrzw
dependent_to.description:
Tkrzw is a C++ library implementing database managers with various
algorithms.

dependent_to.name: r-rhtslib
dependent_to.description:
HTSlib high-throughput sequencing library as an R package. This package
provides version 1.7 of the 'HTSlib' C library for high- throughput
sequence analysis. The package is primarily useful to developers of
other R packages who wish to make use of HTSlib. Motivation and
instructions for use of this package are in the vignette,
vignette(package="Rhtslib", "Rhtslib").

dependent_to.name: squashfuse
dependent_to.description: squashfuse - Mount SquashFS archives using FUSE

dependent_to.name: gdb
dependent_to.description:
GDB, the GNU Project debugger, allows you to see what is going on
'inside' another program while it executes -- or what another program
was doing at the moment it crashed.

dependent_to.name: freebayes
dependent_to.description: Bayesian haplotype-based genetic polymorphism discovery and genotyping.

dependent_to.name: cool
dependent_to.description:
COOL provides specific software components and tools for the handling of
the time variation and versioning of the experiment conditions data.

dependent_to.name: libxslt
dependent_to.description:
Libxslt is the XSLT C library developed for the GNOME project. XSLT
itself is a an XML language to define transformation for XML. Libxslt is
based on libxml2 the XML C library developed for the GNOME project. It
also implements most of the EXSLT set of processor-portable extensions
functions and some of Saxon's evaluate and expressions extensions.

dependent_to.name: hapcut2
dependent_to.description:
HapCUT2 is a maximum-likelihood-based tool for assembling haplotypes
from DNA sequence reads, designed to 'just work' with excellent speed
and accuracy.

dependent_to.name: elfutils
dependent_to.description:
elfutils is a collection of various binary tools such as eu-objdump, eu-
readelf, and other utilities that allow you to inspect and manipulate
ELF files. Refer to Table 5.Tools Included in elfutils for Red Hat
Developer for a complete list of binary tools that are distributed with
the Red Hat Developer Toolset version of elfutils.

dependent_to.name: xrootd
dependent_to.description:
The XROOTD project aims at giving high performance, scalable fault
tolerant access to data repositories of many kinds.

dependent_to.name: ffmpeg
dependent_to.description:
FFmpeg is a complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and
stream audio and video.

dependent_to.name: nix
dependent_to.description: Nix, the purely functional package manager

dependent_to.name: salmon
dependent_to.description:
Salmon is a tool for quantifying the expression of transcripts using
RNA-seq data.

dependent_to.name: graphicsmagick
dependent_to.description:
GraphicsMagick is the swiss army knife of image processing. Provides a
robust and efficient collection of tools and libraries which support
reading, writing, and manipulating an image in over 88 major formats
including important formats like DPX, GIF, JPEG, JPEG-2000, PNG, PDF,
PNM, and TIFF.
